raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a preference for cosmetic and personal care products that deliver effective results, often reflected in high ratings. They consistently express satisfaction with unique items, indicating a desire for distinctiveness and quality. Colorful and long-lasting makeup products resonate well, as shown by the positive sentiment around a lipstick set that they would repurchase. Similarly, the appreciation for unique jewelry items suggests they value individuality in accessories.

The user favors products that enhance appearance and self-care, including hair and skincare items, while noting performance attributes like effectiveness and pleasant scents. Their inclination towards repurchasing and recommending purchases indicates a degree of loyalty towards brands that meet their expectations.

Quality appears more important than lower price tags, suggesting moderate price sensitivity; they appreciate products that offer good performance relative to cost. Overall, the core preferences include a strong appreciation for effective beauty solutions, unique items, and a willingness to invest in quality cosmetics and personal care.

target_interaction.title: i need softer and silky hair
target_interaction.text: my hair is really nappy now. i just want that natural look.  i am trying to see if we women of color can use these products.i thought since you supposed to have rinse hair. i did not, i left it in. i moisturized my hair with a moisturizer and styling cream for natural hair. they even said you blow dry hair after that. my hair did not feels like the white womens hair. maybe i did it wrong. i do like it.i need to know step by step to use how to use these products. that is why i gave it 3 stars.
target_interaction.title_meta: Ownest 2Pcs Magical Keratin Hair Treatment Mask, Repair Damage Hair Root Hair Tonic in 5 Seconds, Nourish Smooth Hair Professional Keratin Hair Treatment Cream-60ml
